page-programs-filter-error: No programs with all your chosen filters (yet).
page-programs-try-removing-filters: Try removing a filter or two, or add to our repository!
page-programs-submit-description: To contribute to our repository, interact with us in our community and let us know about your suggestion! We welcome any feedback and improvement that would help us be helpful to your growth journey.
page-programs-new-github-description: Raise an issue – simply fill in the requested information in the form and paste your program details.
page-programs-pull-request-description: Please make changes on your local version and follow the naming structure for submission.
page-programs-profile-1-description: I’m unsure of my life’s purpose and need guidance in discovering and aligning my actions with my 'why'.
page-programs-profile-2-description: I struggle to find the energy or inspiration to work towards my goals or even start tasks.
page-programs-profile-3-description: I feel overwhelmed by my responsibilities and need help organizing my life.
page-programs-profile-4-description: I feel detached from the people around me and struggle to make meaningful connections.
page-programs-profile-5-description: I don’t understand why others can’t just see things my way, and it leads to interpersonal conflicts.
page-tutorials-env-banner: Don't commit .env! Please make sure never to share or expose your .env file with anyone, as you are compromising your secrets in doing so. If you are using version control, add your .env to a gitignore file.
